languages.text: "С одним предателем вопрос закрыт, Лорд-капитан, но скольких еще лжеисповедник отравил ересью? Надо скорее назначить нового духовного пастыря, чтобы он изгнал из умов экипажа мятежные настроения, насаженные изменником, укрепил веру и послушание. Кроме того, без Корабельного исповедника чернь начнет шептаться, что Император отвернулся от нас, а бунтовщикам такие сомнения только на руку".

traits.locale_text: "С одним предателем вопрос закрыт, Лорд-капитан, но скольких еще лжеисповедник отравил ересью? Надо скорее назначить нового духовного пастыря, чтобы он изгнал из умов паствы мятежные настроения, насаженные изменником, укрепил веру и послушание. Кроме того, без Корабельного исповедника чернь начнет шептаться, что Император отвернулся от нас, а бунтовщикам такие сомнения только на руку".

languages.text: "That is one traitor dealt with, Lord Captain, but how many more have been poisoned by the false confessor's heresy? A new spiritual shepherd must be appointed quickly to banish any mutinous thoughts sown by the traitor from the minds of the crew and to strengthen their faith and obedience. Without the ship's confessor, the rabble will begin to whisper that the Emperor has forsaken us, and such doubts will only play into the rebels' hands."
languages.original_text: "С одним предателем вопрос закрыт, Лорд-капитан, но скольких еще лжеисповедник отравил ересью? {n}Jocasta clears her throat and speaks hoarsely:{/n} "So our vessel's confessor was an apostate and a mutineer... Disturbing news. We must appoint a new spiritual leader for the ship before the rabble starts whispering that the Emperor has forsaken us."

Without the ship's confessor, the rabble will begin to whisper that the Emperor has forsaken us, and such doubts will only play into the rebels' hands."

Without the ship's confessor, the rabble will begin to whisper that the Emperor has forsaken us, and such doubts will only play into the rebels' hands."

languages.text: "Das ist ein Verräter weniger, Lord Captain, aber wie viele andere wurden von der Ketzerei des falschen Konfessors vergiftet? Wir müssen rasch einen neuen spirituellen Hirten ernennen, um die rebellischen Gedanken, die der Verräter gesät hat, aus den Köpfen der Crew zu verbannen und ihren Glauben und Gehorsam zu stärken. Ohne Konfessor wird das Gesindel denken, der Imperator hätte uns verlassen, und derartige Gedanken spielen den Rebellen in die Hände."
languages.original_text: "That is one traitor dealt with, Lord Captain, but how many more have been poisoned by the false confessor's heresy? A new spiritual shepherd must be appointed quickly to banish any mutinous thoughts sown by the traitor from the minds of the crew and to strengthen their faith and obedience. Without the ship's confessor, the rabble will begin to whisper that the Emperor has forsaken us, and such doubts will only play into the rebels' hands."

Wir müssen rasch einen neuen spirituellen Hirten ernennen, um die rebellischen Gedanken, die der Verräter gesät hat, aus den Köpfen der Crew zu verbannen und ihren Glauben und Gehorsam zu stärken. Ohne Konfessor wird das Gesindel denken, der Imperator hätte uns verlassen, und derartige Gedanken spielen den Rebellen in die Hände."

languages.text: «Nos hemos ocupado de un traidor, Lord Capitán, pero ¿a cuántos ha envenenado el falso confesor con su herejía? Necesitamos un nuevo guía espiritual para que destierre los pensamientos rebeldes que sembró el traidor y refuerce su fe y su obediencia. Sin un confesor de la nave, la gente empezará a susurrar que el Emperador nos ha abandonado, lo que solo beneficia a los rebeldes».
languages.original_text: "That is one traitor dealt with, Lord Captain, but how many more have been poisoned by the false confessor's heresy? A new spiritual shepherd must be appointed quickly to banish any mutinous thoughts sown by the traitor from the minds of the crew and to strengthen their faith and obedience. Without the ship's confessor, the rabble will begin to whisper that the Emperor has forsaken us, and such doubts will only play into the rebels' hands."

traits.locale_text: «Nos hemos ocupado de un traidor, Lord Capitán, pero ¿a cuántos ha envenenado el falso confesor con su herejía? Necesitamos un nuevo guía espiritual para que destierre los pensamientos rebeldes que sembró el traidor y refuerce su fe y su obediencia. Sin un confesor de la nave, la gente empezará a susurrar que el Emperador nos ha abandonado, lo que solo beneficia a los rebeldes».

languages.text: 「これで裏切り者を一人処理できました、ロード・キャプテン。ですが、偽物の聴罪師の異端に毒された者はあとどれほどいるのでしょうか？裏切り者が蒔いた反乱思想をクルーの頭から叩き出し、信仰心と服従心を強めるために、新しい信仰の羊飼いを早急に任命しなければなりません。船の聴罪師がいなければ、群衆は皇帝が私たちを見捨てたと騒ぎ始めるでしょうし、そのような疑心暗鬼は反乱軍の思うつぼです」
languages.original_text: "That is one traitor dealt with, Lord Captain, but how many more have been poisoned by the false confessor's heresy? A new spiritual shepherd must be appointed quickly to banish any mutinous thoughts sown by the traitor from the minds of the crew and to strengthen their faith and obedience. Without the ship's confessor, the rabble will begin to whisper that the Emperor has forsaken us, and such doubts will only play into the rebels' hands."

traits.locale_text: 「これで裏切り者を一人処理できました、ロード・キャプテン。ですが、偽物の聴罪師の異端に毒された者はあとどれほどいるのでしょうか？裏切り者が蒔いた反乱思想をクルーの頭から叩き出し、信仰心と服従心を強めるために、新しい信仰の羊飼いを早急に任命しなければなりません。船の聴罪師がいなければ、群衆は皇帝が私たちを見捨てたと騒ぎ始めるでしょうし、そのような疑心暗鬼は反乱軍の思うつぼです」

languages.text: “又少了个叛徒，舰长大人。不过，除了他之外，还有多少人听信了异端邪说，还有多少人遭到了那个冒牌告解神父的毒害？我们必须赶紧任命一位新的精神领袖，消除那个叛徒在船员之中传播的叛乱思潮，让所有船员坚定信仰，服从命令。若是没有告解神父，那些乌合之众恐怕会私底下乱传，说帝皇已经抛弃了我们，而这样的怀疑只会正中叛乱分子的下怀。”
languages.original_text: "That is one traitor dealt with, Lord Captain, but how many more have been poisoned by the false confessor's heresy? A new spiritual shepherd must be appointed quickly to banish any mutinous thoughts sown by the traitor from the minds of the crew and to strengthen their faith and obedience. Without the ship's confessor, the rabble will begin to whisper that the Emperor has forsaken us, and such doubts will only play into the rebels' hands."

traits.locale_text: “又少了个叛徒，舰长大人。不过，除了他之外，还有多少人听信了异端邪说，还有多少人遭到了那个冒牌告解神父的毒害？我们必须赶紧任命一位新的精神领袖，消除那个叛徒在船员之中传播的叛乱思潮，让所有船员坚定信仰，服从命令。若是没有告解神父，那些乌合之众恐怕会私底下乱传，说帝皇已经抛弃了我们，而这样的怀疑只会正中叛乱分子的下怀。”

languages.text: « Nous voilà débarrassés d'un traître, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais combien d'autres encore ont été intoxiqués par l'hérésie du faux confesseur ? Un nouveau guide spirituel doit être nommé au plus vite afin d'affermir leur foi et leur obéissance tout en éradiquant les pensées séditieuses que cet imposteur a pu semer dans les esprits de l'équipage. Sans pasteur pour veiller sur le troupeau des croyants, la populace s'imaginera que l'Empereur nous a abandonnés, et le doute fera le lit de la rébellion. »
languages.original_text: "That is one traitor dealt with, Lord Captain, but how many more have been poisoned by the false confessor's heresy? A new spiritual shepherd must be appointed quickly to banish any mutinous thoughts sown by the traitor from the minds of the crew and to strengthen their faith and obedience. Without the ship's confessor, the rabble will begin to whisper that the Emperor has forsaken us, and such doubts will only play into the rebels' hands."

traits.locale_text: « Nous voilà débarrassés d'un traître, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais combien d'autres encore ont été intoxiqués par l'hérésie du faux confesseur ? Un nouveau guide spirituel doit être nommé au plus vite afin d'affermir leur foi et leur obéissance tout en éradiquant les pensées séditieuses que cet imposteur a pu semer dans les esprits de l'équipage. Sans pasteur pour veiller sur le troupeau des croyants, la populace s'imaginera que l'Empereur nous a abandonnés, et le doute fera le lit de la rébellion. »

languages.text: "Hainlerin birinin icabına bu şekilde bakmış olacağız Lord Kaptan ancak sahte günah çıkarıcının kâfirliği nedeniyle kim bilir kaç kişi zehirlenmiştir? Derhâl yeni bir manevi kılavuz atamalı ve hainin mürettebatın zihnine ekmiş olduğu isyancı düşünceleri bertaraf etmeli, onların inancını ve itaatkârlığını güçlendirmelisiniz. Geminin günah çıkarıcısı olmazsa ayaktakımı İmparator'un bizi terk ettiğini fısıldamaya başlar ve böylesi şüpheler yalnızca isyancıların elini güçlendirir."
languages.original_text: "That is one traitor dealt with, Lord Captain, but how many more have been poisoned by the false confessor's heresy? A new spiritual shepherd must be appointed quickly to banish any mutinous thoughts sown by the traitor from the minds of the crew and to strengthen their faith and obedience. Without the ship's confessor, the rabble will begin to whisper that the Emperor has forsaken us, and such doubts will only play into the rebels' hands."
